Generation VII.Sun: It has gobbled mountains and swallowed whole buildings, according to reports. It's one of the Ultra Beasts.
Generation VII.Moon: A dangerous Ultra Beast, it appears to be eating constantly, but for some reason its droppings have never been found.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Although it's alien to this world and a danger here, it's apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: An unknown life-form called a UB. It may be constantly hungry—it is certainly always devouring something.

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure ) ( Only one , requires unlocking the They Came From The Ultra Beyond! adventure)
